  • A section with inline images.

This page starts with an image

If you hover over the image, a tooltip should pop up in your browser with the text "This is the alternate text for the image".

The image should render as expected, and the alternate text should be there, too. This text is contained in its own paragraph following the image.

This image has an alt text that spans multiple lines:

and more text.

This image doesn't have an alt text, but also doesn't generate a warning:

This image generates a warning if the .qdocconf for this project contains reportmissingalttextforimages = true.
